item.text: Thanks to the efforts of Angel we've located Apocalypse's primary source of energy in Ontario, Canada. It's a nuclear power plant known as The Core.
So this 'Core' is to be our next target?
Yes, Mr. Wagner. Our goal will be to render that facility useless to Apocalypse.
All right. Finally we get a fun mission. I ain't never busted up a nuclear power plant before. That oughta make a lot of noise when it goes off.
I'm sorry, Juggernaut, but we have to be a bit more careful than that. Charles is adamant that we avoid a nuclear meltdown.
Humph, don't that sound just like my little brother - always takin' the fun outta everything.
Once the team arrives at the Core, Forge will take them through very specific steps to shutting down the facility.
Hold on a tic. How do we know this ain't some kinda trap? You know, like Destiny was sayin'... a team member is gonna betray us.
Are you suggesting Angel would send us into a trap?
Oh, I'm not suggestin' it. I'm sayin' it right out loud. Angel might be handin' us over to Apocalypse.
Ya know, the little guy's got a point.
That's preposterous, Angel would never do such a thing.
But what about that Shaw bloke Angel got the info from? Maybe he's workin' for Apocalypse and he sendin' us to our doom.
What would you have us do, Toad? Trust no one? Never leave on another mission?
No, I will not allow us to fall into the trap of second guessing every action. We're going to the Core and that's final.
